nodes.text: The Mon Calamari male Furan led a small-time criminal organization that indulged in the theft of vehicles. Just prior to the Second Galactic Civil War, the crime spree of Furan's social club was brought to an end by the intervention of Jedi Knight Tahiri Veila.

Furan's social club's first and only mention is in Fate of the Jedi: Conviction, the seventh novel in the nine-part Fate of the Jedi series. While the organization is merely mentioned in Conviction, several of its members were briefly featured.
